title: multinomial function defaults different for Tensor and Variable
body_html:
Hi,

'num_samples' in multinomial for Variable defaults to 1 and 'num_samples' multinomial for Tensor requires an argument. Threw me off for a bit. I'm not sure if this has to be the case for some architectural reason. Making it known just in case.

Thanks!

body:
Hi,

'num_samples' in multinomial for Variable defaults to 1 and 'num_samples' multinomial for Tensor requires an argument. Threw me off for a bit. I'm not sure if this has to be the case for some architectural reason. Making it known just in case.

Thanks!
